title: Nucleic acid-based wearable and implantable electrochemical sensors
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00001C, Review Article
Cui Ye, Heather Lukas, Minqiang Wang, Yerim Lee, Wei Gao
This review discusses the advancements, sensor design, and challenges in creating wearable and implantable nucleic acid-based sensors for personalized healthcare through real-time biomarker analysis in biofluids.
